ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] My source of income
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah...I tried to group in Unrest(or is it Befallen...never can remember...the place that drops small ringmail) and the trains just kept wiping me out...died
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah...I tried to group in Unrest(or is it Befallen...never can
remember...the place that drops small ringmail)
and the trains just kept wiping me out...died three times before I just left
the area.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Danspath [SMTP:danspth@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 9:55 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] My source of income
>
> An interesting idea...but you are 17? At about level
> 25 you can hunt critters that drop platinum loot plus
> fine steel weapons (5 plat per sell at vendor).
>
> --- "IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield"
> <persona@...> wrote:
> > Starting Friday...I'm going to sit in Crushbone for
> > two hours and see how
> > many pp I can get if I really try to kill every
> > centurian I can find and
> > sell each belt for 1pp.
> >
> > Oh and I'm using a level 17 Druid Sarakan on the
> > Bertoxx server
> >
> > If I make enough money...I'm afraid I'll be one of
> > those who sit in an area
> > and farm the belts/pads for a living :>
> >
>
>
